title: Myntist.official
author: Myntist.official
content: As the crypto market grow, these type of incidence really effect the market. I think strong project are on the stack now as trust on the ecosystem of strong projects like DOT, ETH and BNB are on the verge of crumbling. But it's a matter of life of death when it comes to all in your life savings. Share your thoughts how you would improvise your portfolio?

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: Some whales realized that after a certain threshold, Luna could do nothing to stop people from crashing it. I do not remember the exact amount but it was something like 350 million dollars if I am not wrong. So if you spent over that amount, then you could crash Luna and basically UST. This would force Luna team to sell all their holdings to keep UST high, which means selling that much bitcoin.So, if you did that AND shorted bitcoin at the same time, it was basically guaranteed to make a profit. This is what whales did, and Luna team tried to defend and that is exactly what whales wanted them to do, and we never really recovered from there.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: The reason why people are devasted is because it wasn't their investments like Bitcoin or Ethereum that lost value, it was the stablecoin. The stablecoin should of been pegged properly to the US dollar and this shouldn't have happened.The issuance rate couldn't keep upwith keeping the peg at 1:1 and seems that both the UST and LUNA pairs are getting removed from most exchanges as we speak. Basically its like $40B gone in a week or two. This was much worse than the Bitconnect scam back in 2018.People are mad because Do Kwon made it seems like keeping it backed by BTC would make it more secure and decentrazlied than tether and people kept their life savings in it.

comments.author: southerngentuk
comments.body: Quote from: Myntist.official on May 12, 2022, 02:17:05 PMAs the crypto market grow, these type of incidence really effect the market. I think strong project are on the stack now as trust on the ecosystem of strong projects like DOT, ETH and BNB are on the verge of crumbling. But it's a matter of life of death when it comes to all in your life savings. Share your thoughts how you would improvise your portfolio? Cases related to financial investment leading to bankruptcy in the past have also happened a lot, and now this is happening again. I too have had very difficult periods in my life, but never have I wanted it to just stop at such negative things. Life has so many lessons that we need to overcome, and death never comes. There is a good solution to help life. When the results lead to such a loss, then think about what you have learned before and sometimes talking about life's destiny is an answer that is probably not a good way to look at it. In every person's life, money is really important, but you should consider it as a tool to develop yourself. Don't make it an ideal of life so that the influence makes those who cannot control it stop the journey of your life. I don't want these things to continue, but maybe they will still choose the end. If you see this, share it. Remember that life out there is still a lot of hungry people every day. They don't have enough food. We still have to be optimistic to continue because this life is really precious. We can create those things. Don't let it control us.

The popular advise about investing what we can afford to lose.This is how it goes. Because if you do invest everything that you can in a very volatile market, you'll definitely going to be upset when you see all of it go down.That's why as you invest, make sure that you only put what you're okay to lose. And do not worry, if you invest to bitcoin and ethereum, they'll eventually recover. But to the coins like Luna and UST, we'll never know if they'll recover or not.Always be vocal with what you feel to your family so that they'll guide you and that money can still be worked on to recover.
